mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles ( user_id, title, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.article_id AS articleId, a.user_id AS userId, u.name AS userName, a.title AS title, a.created_at AS createAt FROM articles a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.created_at DESC

SELECT a.article_id AS articleId, a.user_id AS userId, u.nickname AS userName, a.title, a.created_at AS createdAt, COALESCE(rv.reviewCount, 0) AS reviewCount, COALESCE(rc.recommendCount, 0) AS recommentCount FROM articles a JOIN users u ON u.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_id, COUNT(*) AS reviewCount FROM reviews GROUP BY article_id ) rv ON rv.article_id = a.article_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_id, COUNT(*) AS recommendCount FROM recommands GROUP BY article_id ) rc ON rc.article_id = a.article_id
ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
